item.title: Let’s talk about mime
item.author: Herpreet Bhamra,
item.description: Flesh and Blood & Fish and Fowl (The Barbican) “Taxidermied animals creep into view” The Office with a taxidermied twist is an excellent description of this apocalyptic physical comedy from American duo Geoff Sobelle and Charlotte Ford. Emerging from an oversized bin and the office toilet, Gerry …
